languages.text: "Все-таки хотите нас покинуть, госпо{mf|дин|жа} Фиделио?" {n}Мужчина говорит негромко, но из его голоса пропадают все намеки на вежливость. В вас снова упираются взгляды присутствующих — и все как один кладут руки на оружие.{/n}

"Planning to leave us after all, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio?" {n}His voice is quiet, but any hint of courtesy is gone. Once more, everyone's eyes focus on you — as their hands reach for their weapons.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Все-таки хотите нас покинуть, госпо{mf|дин|жа} Фиделио?" {n}Мужчина говорит негромко, но из его голоса пропадают все намеки на вежливость. В вас снова упираются взгляды присутствующих — и все как один кладут руки на оружие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You want to leave us after all, {mf|Master|Madam} Fidelio?" {n}His voice is quiet, but any hint of courtesy is gone. Once more, everyone's eyes focus on you — as their hands reach for their weapons.{/n}

"You want to leave us after all, {mf|Master|Madam} Fidelio?" {n}His voice is quiet, but any hint of courtesy is gone. Once more, everyone's eyes focus on you — as their hands reach for their weapons.{/n}

"Planning to leave us after all, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio?" {n}His voice is quiet, but any hint of courtesy is gone. Once more, everyone's eyes focus on you — as their hands reach for their weapons.{/n}

"Planning to leave us after all, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio?" {n}His voice is quiet, but any hint of courtesy is gone. Once more, everyone's eyes focus on you — as their hands reach for their weapons.{/n}

"Planning to leave us after all, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio?" {n}His voice is quiet, but any hint of courtesy is gone. Once more, everyone's eyes focus on you — as their hands reach for their weapons.{/n}

languages.text: “你就打算这么一走了之吗，菲迪奥{mf|大师|女士}？”{n}他的声音很平静，但不再有任何礼貌的意味。这一次，所有人的目光再次集中在你身上，每个人的手都朝各自的武器摸去。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Planning to leave us after all, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio?" {n}His voice is quiet, but any hint of courtesy is gone. Once more, everyone's eyes focus on you — as their hands reach for their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你就打算这么一走了之吗，菲迪奥{mf|大师|女士}？”{n}他的声音很平静，但不再有任何礼貌的意味。这一次，所有人的目光再次集中在你身上，每个人的手都朝各自的武器摸去。{/n}

languages.text: «¿Piensa dejarnos después de todo, señor{mf||a} Fidelio?». {n}Su voz es callada, pero su anterior cortesía se ha esfumado. Una vez más, todas las miradas están sobre ti... y la gente prepara sus armas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Planning to leave us after all, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio?" {n}His voice is quiet, but any hint of courtesy is gone. Once more, everyone's eyes focus on you — as their hands reach for their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Piensa dejarnos después de todo, señor{mf||a} Fidelio?». {n}Su voz es callada, pero su anterior cortesía se ha esfumado. Una vez más, todas las miradas están sobre ti... y la gente prepara sus armas.{/n}

languages.text: 「結局お帰りになるのかい、{mf|マスター|ミストレス}・フィデリオ？」{n}彼の声は静かだが、礼儀正しさのかけらもない。再び全員の視線がこちらに向けられ、各々が武器に手を伸ばす。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Planning to leave us after all, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio?" {n}His voice is quiet, but any hint of courtesy is gone. Once more, everyone's eyes focus on you — as their hands reach for their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「結局お帰りになるのかい、{mf|マスター|ミストレス}・フィデリオ？」{n}彼の声は静かだが、礼儀正しさのかけらもない。再び全員の視線がこちらに向けられ、各々が武器に手を伸ばす。{/n}

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr uns nun doch verlassen, {mf|Herr|Herrin} Fidelio?" {n}Seine Stimme ist ruhig, aber jeder Hauch von Höflichkeit ist verschwunden. Erneut sind alle Augen auf dich gerichtet – während die Hände nach den Waffen greifen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Planning to leave us after all, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio?" {n}His voice is quiet, but any hint of courtesy is gone. Once more, everyone's eyes focus on you — as their hands reach for their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wollt Ihr uns nun doch verlassen, {mf|Herr|Herrin} Fidelio?" {n}Seine Stimme ist ruhig, aber jeder Hauch von Höflichkeit ist verschwunden. Erneut sind alle Augen auf dich gerichtet – während die Hände nach den Waffen greifen.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous avez donc décidé de nous quitter, {mf|maître|maîtresse} Fidélio ? »{n}vous demande Daggen d'une voix douce, mais dépourvue de la moindre trace de courtoisie. Une fois de plus, vous êtes au centre de l'attention. Et pour ne rien arranger, tout le monde s'empare de son arme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Planning to leave us after all, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio?" {n}His voice is quiet, but any hint of courtesy is gone. Once more, everyone's eyes focus on you — as their hands reach for their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez donc décidé de nous quitter, {mf|maître|maîtresse} Fidélio ? »{n}vous demande Daggen d'une voix douce, mais dépourvue de la moindre trace de courtoisie. Une fois de plus, vous êtes au centre de l'attention. Et pour ne rien arranger, tout le monde s'empare de son arme.{/n}

languages.text: "Bizi öylece bırakıp gitmeyi mi düşünüyordunuz Fidelio {mf|Bey|Hanım}?" {n}Sesi kısık çıksa da nezaketten eser kalmamış. Herkesin gözleri bir kez daha sana çevriliyor. Tek fark, bu kez ellerinin silahlarına uzanıyor olması.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Planning to leave us after all, {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio?" {n}His voice is quiet, but any hint of courtesy is gone. Once more, everyone's eyes focus on you — as their hands reach for their weapons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Onca şeyden sonra bizi yalnız bırakmayı mı düşünüyorsunuz {mf|Beyefendi|Hanımefendi} Fidelio?" {n}Sessiz bir ses tonuyla konuşsa da hiç nazik değil. Herkesin elleri silahlarına uzanırken yeniden sana bakıyorlar.{/n}
